name: Maths Kombat l
description:
Learning maths has never been so easy! Maths Kombat I - is a perfect blend of education & game, with a vast question bank covering over 300 concepts. It caters to CBSE curriculum of 8th class Maths. Detailed analysis of performance, voice guided crisp notes ensures conceptual clarity of kids. Play Maths Kombat I to clear your fundamental concepts.

Conquer the world with your skills! Get a chance to be a part of the Super Brain Club! Speed and accuracy will help you lead the game! The faster you workout, the more rewards, scholarship & money you earn. Liberty to learn concepts at your convenience! After playing this game, you will never go back to conventional online test. Eduisfun games have topped the Trending list on Google Play. Learn Maths in a gamified way and also earn rewards for the same.

Topics
Rational Numbers & Linear Equations
Understanding Quadrilaterals
Data Handling
Squares and Square Roots
Cubes and Cube Roots
Comparing Quantities
Algebraic Expressions and Identities
Visualising Solid Shapes
Mensuration and Exponents
Direct and Inverse Proportions
Factorisation
Introduction to Graphs
Playing with Numbers


Additional
- Tracker to keep tab of your weak concepts & improve
- Single player game with no number crunching required
